content: Absolutely, that's a great way to look at it. While we may not know for sure what we're capable of until faced with extreme circumstances, the resilience and determination we're capable of can be a source of comfort and reassurance. Knowing that we have the potential to persevere through adversity can help us to stay optimistic and hopeful, even in the face of challenging situations. And in the event that we ever do face such a situation, we may surprise ourselves with the strength and willpower that we're able to summon.
